home.subtitle: Creative ideas, technical expertise and state-of-the-art cloud infrastructure. Our web agency has everything you need.
home.ghost: Contact us to create your blog

studio.title: Studio
studio.subtitle: We don't build websites, we build

slider.slide1: Input studio is a 100% REMOTE web agency based in Abidjan. With us, building a website is much more than just doing integration.
slider.slide2: In fact, our team will support you from design to the launch of your website.
slider.slide3: We combine design and development skills to offer our customers outstanding websites that reflect their identity.

activities.title: What do we do?
activities.subtitle: Input studio is a product-oriented team. We design and develop complete web solutions with a professional look and feel using the latest technologies.
activities.design: Our ultimate goal is to provide platforms that deliver an exceptional user experience and enable our customers to achieve their business objectives.
activities.development: Our programming expertise and commitment to quality enable us to realize our customers' visions with excellence.
activities.deployment: We take care of the deployment of your technology solutions, ensuring that they are correctly configured and optimized for performance.

qualities.title: Our strengths
qualities.subtitle: These combined qualities make us a reliable and successful creative web agency. We strive to deliver high-quality services and create solutions that meet our customers' unique needs, ensuring their satisfaction every step of the way.
qualities.creativity-desc: We're passionate about creativity and innovation, pushing boundaries with unique solutions. Our team of designers and developers follows the latest trends for modern, captivating designs.
qualities.competence-desc: Our qualified technical team masters the latest technologies for robust, scalable solutions.
qualities.client-desc: We place our customers at the heart of our approach, listening carefully to their needs and fostering transparent communication and close collaboration throughout the project.
qualities.conception-desc: We place great importance on the quality of our designs, creating user-friendly, aesthetically pleasing interfaces that optimize the user experience.
qualities.commitment-desc: We are committed to delivering high-quality solutions to our customers. Our aim is to exceed our customers' expectations and deliver tangible added value.
qualities.reactivity-desc: We strive to respond quickly to our customers' requests and questions. What's more, we're flexible, adapting to any changes that may occur during the course of a project, while ensuring that agreed deadlines are met.

projects.title: Our projects
projects.subtitle: Our pride and joy
projects.description: We only commit to projects that reflect our core values, and we're passionate about being fully involved every step of the way.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Let's make it happen!
contact.form-subtitle: Fill in this form and we will contact you as soon as possible to discuss your project.
contact.form-message: Tell us more about your project

careers.title: We are hiring
careers.description: Input studio is always open to smart, creative people. Join our team of like-minded people striving to achieve their goals. Let's work together towards success! We're interested in building a community of individuals who share our values and goals.

meta.title: Web development agency
meta.description: Input Studio, your web agency in Abidjan, specializes in the custom creation of websites and mobile applications using modern technologies, in 100% remote mode.
